Package edu.uw.tcss.game

package edu.uw.tcss.game
TCSS 305 Game Application - Educational demonstration of modern Java design patterns.

This is the root package for a simple grid-based game that demonstrates best practices in Java application design, including MVC architecture, the Observer pattern, and modern Java language features.

Entry Point: Application.main(String[])

Key Packages:

  • edu.uw.tcss.game.model - Game logic and state management
  • edu.uw.tcss.game.gui.controller - User input handling and game control
  • edu.uw.tcss.game.gui.view - Visual representation of game state
  • edu.uw.tcss.game.gui.util - GUI utility classes
Version:
Winter 2025
Author:
Charles Bryan
